Omicron_Resource.MainDesc: This Element grants the access to an OMICRON CMC 256 device.
Omicron_Resource.IP_Address: IP_Address of the defined Omicron device. But the device will not be accessed directly over TCP/IP but through a OLE element (by Omicron)
Omicron_Resource.ProgPath: Path to the activeX program element of Omicron (CMEngine)
